name: America's Next Top Model
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Become the catwalk star!

Start your own modeling career and prove your talent to the judges during photo shoots, on the catwalk and through your overall style.

Limos! Shopping! Fitness! Clothes! Makeovers! Fierce competition! Stand up against the other models but never lose sight of your goal: becoming America's Next Top Model!
  • Huge 3D world with villa, city and luxury hotel
  • 4 playable models & 13 fashion styles including 60's/70's, Romantic, Underground
